CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1946, pg. 12, in "Public Opinion" Column, with question: "Do you feel that the city administration has been fair regarding the appointment of Negro fire captains in Hill District?" Cutline of image reads: "Dr. Royal Taylor, 3118 Avalon Street, dentist: 'I feel that the city has been fair thus far.  We have had Negro fire captains in the past.  One should note that we only have two companies as it is, and they are, and have been, captained by their own men.  In connection with the situation, I would like to add that from my point of view people should measure up to their responsibility."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Dr. Royal W. Taylor wearing double breasted pinstriped suit and wire framed eyeglasses, posed in Harris Studio
